basic.blooming: Flowering period spring summer, planted year around
basic.color: Flower color white, yellow, corydalis or red, fruit color white, brown, purple or with color patches

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 6-7
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: No need to apply extra fertilizer before fruiting
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
